name: wolfy-wallet
description: Wallet extension with EIP-7702, EIP-5792, and Arx HaLo chip support

scripts.build:all: bun run build:clean && bun run build:background && bun run build:content && bun run build:popup && bun run build:notification && bun run build:inpage && bun run build:assets
scripts.build:popup: bun run build:popup:html && bun run build:popup:js && bun run build:popup:expanded && bun run build:popup:polyfill
scripts.build:popup:js: bun build src/popup/index.tsx --outdir dist/popup --target browser --format esm --external ethers
scripts.build:popup:polyfill: bun build src/popup/polyfill-loader.ts --outdir dist/popup --target browser --format esm --outfile polyfill-loader.js
scripts.build:popup:html: mkdir -p dist/popup && cp src/popup/index.html dist/popup/index.html && cp src/popup/firefly-connect.html dist/popup/firefly-connect.html 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/popup/firefly-connect.js dist/popup/firefly-connect.js 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/popup/rabby-styles.css dist/popup/rabby-styles.css && cp src/popup/wolfy-logo.png dist/popup/wolfy-logo.png 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:popup:expanded: bun build src/popup/expanded.tsx --outdir dist/popup --target browser --format esm --external ethers --outfile expanded.js && cp src/popup/expanded.html dist/popup/expanded.html
scripts.build:notification: bun run build:notification:html && bun run build:notification:js
scripts.build:notification:html: mkdir -p dist/notification && cp src/notification/index.html dist/notification/index.html && cp src/popup/rabby-styles.css dist/notification/rabby-styles.css
scripts.build:notification:js: bun build src/notification/index.tsx --outdir dist/notification --target browser --format esm --external ethers
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p dist/icons && mkdir -p dist/popup/lib && bun run build:icons && bun run build:ethers && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r icons/* dist/icons/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/popup/lib/libhalo.js dist/popup/lib/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/popup/lib/firefly.js dist/popup/lib/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:ethers: bun build node_modules/ethers/lib.esm/index.js --outfile dist/popup/lib/ethers.js --target browser --format esm --minify
scripts.build:icons: sips -z 16 16 wolfy.svg.png --out icons/icon16.png 2>/dev/null || true && sips -z 32 32 wolfy.svg.png --out icons/icon32.png 2>/dev/null || true && sips -z 48 48 wolfy.svg.png --out icons/icon48.png 2>/dev/null || true && sips -z 128 128 wolfy.svg.png --out icons/icon128.png 2>/dev/null || true
